attributes.action: Appoint Scott and Marissa Orton of St George, Ontario, Canada to the status of King and Queen of St George, please.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown,
I live in Canada now, that little cold country we still own over to the West and just a little bit above America where all the fat people live?
My good friends Scott & Marissa Orton live in a little village called St George with 2 dogs, Gordon and Brown, they recently bought an RV which inside looks like a Palace with a sink and a bucket.
They are really nice people and I would like you to consider making them King and Queen of St George because Marissa would look lovely with a crown as she has such beautiful hair.
They have volunteered to look after Buckingham Palace when the Queen is on vacation or posing for a new stamp. Scott has a working knowledge of vacuum cleaners and Marissa invented Fabreze but was too proud to market it. She also named it Kamoola-zoom-bang before it became Fabreeze. I am in the process of perfecting my latest invention for them, the Easy Broom. Basically it is a broom powered by children’s tears and a fetish for cheese remnants. 
King Scott 1st and I have no ambition to form an Air Force or Navy but we do have lots of toy soldiers in our Army, all named after famous sports shoe manufacturers. We have 3 soldiers, Sergeant Nike, Corporal Adidas and Private Puma.
attributes.creator_name: Lord David Andrew Twelve Bicycle Forde

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
